title: If a boy can't learn
creator_credit: Lawrence A Williams, Susan S Trout and Lawren Productions
brief_description: Looks at the problem of a boy with learning disabilities, who is sent to a Learning Disabilities Center for diagnostic workup and testing. A specialist confers with the boy’s teachers and together they improvise ways of teaching to his strengths in order to compensate for his disabilities and help him learn. Excellent for teacher training and can be valuable to parents.
